label: *ègé bɛ-dà [ke-plekpà nì lɔ/$ø$ ]
trs: What did they sell the book  and?’\footnote{This sentence can  only have the meaning `By using what did they sell the book?' Also, the pronoun lɔ is drawn from noun class 2, hence the gloss.}
